message.body: Hi again, webfoot
Howdy Jurgen. How's your Friday going?
I've just found out the reason - a weird bug in wc - and am correcting the corpus stats. U?
Spent all afternoon so far chasing down a difference of 2 in the word count of one file on a set of 350. This is the *only* such anomaly in this corpus.
I actually have to go deal with a small emergency right now
Maybe I can send some texts later today
Go!
Stand not upon the order of your going But go at once! Don't let it become a big emergency.
Thanks, talk to you later
Sorry to cut u off like that my girlfriends mother is having a medical emergency.
Hell, no apology necessary! That's what emergency means. Like an ambulance, and for the same reason. Everything else must yields to it. I hope she's OK,
or will be.
We think she will be ok. She had a small stroke, but I am watching my girlfriends daughter at the moment.
Good for you. I hope & pray she'll be OK. Of course your girlfriend wants to be w her mother, who probably needs her.
Is GFM conscious?
She is up and about, it wasn't too serious I guess it wasn't to severe, but still a big scare that will require some rehab
Thank Heaven! How old is she?
I think she is mid 60s
All best wishes. If you like, & have the spoons for it, I can chat intermittently while doing desk stuff at home.
Thanks ill try to keep up during any down time
aven't had a chance to talk in a long while. And we had plenty of opportunity while walking to the bus stop, 'cause she walks v e r y s l o
I went over to the happy hour@34/Walnut (last of the semester), then came back to meet a friendwho was interviewing here. 'Twas good to see her, as we h
w l y .
Sounds like a good time despite the slow pace.
How did you know one another?
c at the foot of the WP story.
mans Didn't Exist (Climate Central). Google for "carbon dioxide milestone". Washington Post article, with link to that one. Ima blog the combined graphi
Oh yes, and I wasn't complaining. Change of topic: Filing bills and going online to check my bank acct, I saw this: The Last Time CO2 Was This High, Hu
Oh fooey. Just realized: I've been using "WP" for "wikipedia". gotta change that.
Congregation.
That CO2 news is not surprising seeing how the scientific community has been saying that would happen for over a decade at least.
Do you know of any solutions to the CO2 problem this late in the game?
How do you persuade the world to abandon fossil fuels And put an end to the profits they allow for?
I don't see an answer without some form of global anti capitalists movement which seems very unlikely
We will probably burn up first.
Damfino. Maybe stories like this will wake up some of the I-don't-cares enough to pressure the lawmakers into enough concern to resist the megacorps.
:-( Yeahâ€¦ gotta hope we're wrong.
Oh, and of course the fundie idiots who insist that it's God's plan.

It seems that the motivating factor of the global economic system is Strictly profit based and until we begin to recognize that this is a game that noone wins in the end we will make little or no progress on CO2 increases and global warming
But I don't feel we can just vote the problem away because politics at least in the US are controlled on both sides by the Corps that are founded on thecreation of this environmental crisis
at grows straight out of self-interest, & lack of self-interest, in evolutionary terms & timescale, is, roughly speaking, counter-survival.
I have little hope for that. I'm not going to give up though, partly bc I don't agree that our only hope is for everyone to give up on profit motive. Th
I still have hope that occasionally decency will prevail, even in politics. See upthread, 1st sentence in my 10:40. I CAN'T give up on this hope, or I'l
l have no hope for humanity at all.
e. In short I do not believe that the market can correct all threats to existance.
I believe in profit motive but not exclusively profit motive and think that other motivations need to be considered as much as profit if we are to surviv
I think a message from you may have dropped out? Your 2145 eggs i n "crisis" & ur 2200 begins "e. In short"
Oh boy now I see. 3 parts reached me out of sequence!!
In that, then, we agree. :-)
I think we feel similarly too. I'm going to call it a night. Sorry about the break in the conversation and hope you enjoy the weekend.
You too. Yeah, i've gotta hang up to o. Have a good one!
